alert.note: Alert for Morton (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 21 at 5:24PM CDT until July 21 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL MORTON COUNTY... At 523 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fish Creek Dam, or 15 miles west of Mandan, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mandan, New Salem, Fish Creek Dam, Judson, Sweet Briar Lake and Crown Butte Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
